attributes.action: hold a referendum on the manner in which expenses should be paid to Members of the House.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Considering the current expenses issue within the house it is inappropriate and also against public interest to allow Members of Parliament to vote on how expenses will be paid to them. As such it is more appropriate to provide a clear question with various different schemes to be placed to the British electorate over this issue in order to restore confidence in the house.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
